item.title: NYC Mayor Zohran Mamdani hands out free theater tickets to residents in partnership with festival
item.description: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani partnered with an ongoing theater festival to hand out free tickets to city residents.

item.title: American protesters brave D.C. chill to call for Iranian regime change
item.description: Amid the rain and cold, Iranian Americans gathered near the White House on Saturday in solidarity with protests across Iran.
